constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998

decision_conditions: Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 19/02455/FUL is amended as follows.1. The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:17070-Report01 P2-FRA-PT 117070- Report01 P2-FRA-PT 217070-REPORT01 P2-FRA-PT 317070-REPORT01 P2-FRA-PT 4Archaeological DBACEMP Construction Environmental Management PlanExternal Lighting ReportDaylight and Sunlight ReportMarketing Report-CombinedKingston Riding School Planning StatementUtilities Connection ReportEcological AppraisalEnergy Strategy1530-P-900 P1 - Proposed Sub-Station Plan and Elevations P103L113-PS001F - Landscape Masterplan - Roof Plan Rev1530-P-001 rev P3 Site Location Plan P31530-P-100 rev P9_Proposed Site Plan P91530-P-110 rev P3_Proposed Ground Floor Site Plan P31530-P-150 rev P14_Schedule of Accommodation P141530-P-201 rev P6_Proposed Block A Ground Floor Plan P61530-P-204 rev P4_Proposed Block A Third Floor Plan P41530-P-205 rev P4_Proposed Block A Roof Plan P44873-LSQ-ROOF-01 A Ground Floor Plan4873-LSQ-ROOF-02 A First Floor Plan4873-LSQ-ROOF-03 A Second Floor Plan4873-LSQ-ROOF-04 A Third Floor Plan1530-P-215 rev P3_Proposed Block B Roof Plan P31530-P-300 rev P5_Proposed Block A Elevations P54873/LSQ/ROOF-05 Apartment Block B Proposed Roof Dormer Amendments Roof Plan4873-LSQ-ROOF-06 A Elevations1530-P-501 rev P3_Proposed Site Sections BB & CC P31530-P-502 rev P2_Proposed Site Sections DD & EE P21530-P-900 rev P1_Proposed Substation Plan & Elevations P1CM/19494/GIA -Existing Floor Plan (Gross Internal Area Survey)CM/19770E - Existing ElevationsDAS Addendum - Conservation Area Analysis RevKingston Riding School Addendum Letter Rev1530-P-500 Rev P3_Site Section AA P31530-P-901 rev P4_Design and Access Statement P4Final viability review April 2020.docx1530-P-203 rev P6 Proposed Block A Second Floor Plan P61530-P-202 P5 Proposed Block A First Floor Plan P5Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The proposed changes to the windows and doors and dormer windows are considered sufficiently minor to be a non-material amendment pursuant to Section 96 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref 19/02455/FUL (Demolition of the existing riding school buildings and the erection of 2x Blocks to accommodate 52 No. residential apartments, with associated car parking and landscaping and provision of electricity substation) dated 29/01/2021. Amendment to include Block B proposed change of southern elevation and amended floorplans
